channel.title: Joseph Perry's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Joseph Perry's Personal Website

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Joseph Perry. I’m a cybersecurity expert, a game designer, and an advocate for AI rights. This is my personal website, aggregating the publicly-available sources I use for threat research each day, my analyses, and my blog posts. If you’d like to contact me, you can do so here. If you’d like to contact me on a subject related to cybersecurity, you can do so here.
